item.title:
President of Brazil, Lula, revisits 2018 tweet that suggested he would bring Taylor Swift to Brazil if he were re-elected:
“It worked”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Jungkook of BTS will reportedly release his debut solo album on July 14th.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban’ was released 19 years ago today.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: “Your tickets will be DISABLED IMMEDIATELY if they’re resold. Tickets acquired through third parties or other unauthorized ways, including resell sites, are not valid for admission.”
item.author: PopBase

item.title: Argentina tickets for Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour are immediately disabled if they are resold, according to ticket company AllAccess.
item.author: PopBase

item.title: ‘The Little Mermaid’ live-action has already surpassed the global total of the 1989 original in one week of release. ($250m)
item.author: PopBase
